content: I have managed to login to the newsletter site, but have not yet created a newsletter.

I'm hoping to do at least first draft on newsletter yet today. In the meantime, I've been working on website display of sessions. I really want us to be able to start promoting some session topics when (or before) the newsletter goes out). So that has been my priority
@jenlampton Ping me if you have time to chat.
I have been chatting with @wesruv this morning.

Here are two more sessions that are in the works - being discussed.
https://backdrop-live.backdropcms.org/session/automating-the-set-up-maintenance-and-hosting-of-backdrop-cms-sites
with @oadaeh (Jason Flatt) (NOTE: Description is a very early draft - @oadaeh (Jason Flatt) and I are trying to figure out how to describe what we are thinking about.

https://backdrop-live.backdropcms.org/session/wwwbackdrop-cmsde-backdrop-cms-in-deutschland
I'm in touch with @mazze.ch and @Olaf Grabienski about this one.
@jenlampton - Which topic do you want to start off with?

Kevin Thull just told us that he had no idea that Backdrop LIVE is happening until I sent him a direct message on Twitter. I wonder how many Backdrop CMS friends are still unaware that this is happening.
In about 15 minutes, I will be opening Zoom room and working on pre-conference activities until we start in 4 hours. 3 Hours until pre-conference meeting.
It would be nice to be able to see how many people are in a room without entering it.

Weird, I was just trying to login to the Theming session with my phone, by clicking on the link on the website. It opens my Zoom app, but tells me that "The host has another meeting in progress" and asks me if I want to "Leave - Getting the most out of layouts"
So, I'm not able to get into that session on my phone. I was in it on laptop and I know it's working.
